title: Login Problems
body: I've been getting [this screen](https://i.gyazo.com/8462c9f422c3d0e7d5ea8eb296a37f08.png) whenever I've tried to login recently. It started a couple days ago where I played a couple games and when I came back like 2 hours later I couldn't login anymore. I have already tried everything they told me to do in the link as well as reinstalling lol. I also tried using the Hextech Repair Tool but that didn't work either. Does anyone have any other tips that are not on the Riot website? Pls halp, I need to climb to get my challenger jacket, cuz it's freezing over here in the winter.

replies.body: I have the same problem!!! please help Rito.

It sounds like your network can't connect to the login servers.  I know you've tried some troubleshooting already, but those steps won't really resolve network issues but moreso game file problems.  Instead, I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
